string.name: intro_summary
string.b: Export Contacts is an application to help you export your contacts directly from your Android device without the need to upload them to Google first. A vCard contacts file is exported to your SD card directly from the phones contact list.

resources.string: For help using this application or to report bugs to the author, please visit:
If you purchased this app, you are helping to support an independent developer and his family. We\'d like to say thank you!

Export Contacts is licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 3 or, at your option, any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.
To export all your contacts to a single vCard file, you must specify where to store that vCard on SD Card and the name of the file to store them in.
If you are unsure, just click "Next".
Directory to save vCard file to:
Are you ready to begin exporting contacts?
Your device\'s SD card could not be found or used. Is your device still connected to a computer?
There are no contacts to export!
The file you are writing to already exists. If you continue it will be overwritten.
A contact exists for which there is no name (or other suitable indentification), so it can not be saved.
